item.title: 应用营养公司首次公开募股募集 2.04 亿美元，首次亮相伦敦
item.description: Applied Nutrition Plc 公司在首次公开募股中筹集了 1.575 亿英镑（2.04 亿美元）的资金，从而提振了伦敦低迷的资本市场，并为十年前创立这家蛋白质奶昔生产商的前脚手架工人带来了一笔意外之财。【原文：Applied Nutrition Plc raised £157.5 million ($204 million) in an initial public offering, lifting London’s sluggish capital market and delivering a windfall to the former scaffolder who founded the protein-shake maker a decade ago.】

item.title: 巴克莱交易员和交易商帮助税前利润超过预期
item.description: 由于近几个月来各类资产的波动性上升，巴克莱银行第三季度交易收入增加，从而推动了利润的增长。【原文：Barclays Plc profit was buoyed by an increase in trading revenue in the third quarter as it benefited from the uptick in volatility across asset classes in recent months.】

item.title: 联合利华调整后销售额增速加快
item.description: 随着联合利华首席执行官海因-舒马赫（Hein Schumacher）扭转消费品公司局面的步伐加快，该公司的销售额也在加速增长。【原文：Unilever Plc’s sales growth is accelerating as Chief Executive Officer Hein Schumacher’s turnaround of the consumer goods company gathers pace.】

item.title: 爱马仕销售额攀升，Birkin 手袋制造商展现韧性
item.description: 爱马仕（Hermes）销售额增长，原因是该公司生产的 Birkin 手袋满足了市场对其价格昂贵的手袋的强劲需求，在整个奢侈品市场不景气的情况下逆势上扬。【原文：Hermes sales rose as the Birkin bag maker met resilient demand for its pricey handbags, bucking the broader luxury market slump.】

item.title: 英镑飙升后，英国公司正在购买长期货币对冲产品
item.description: 受英镑飙升以及对全球地缘政治不确定性将引发更多波动的担忧影响，英国公司正在锁定更长时间的货币对冲。【原文：British companies are locking in currency hedges for longer, driven by the pound’s surge and concerns that global geopolitical uncertainty will spur more volatility.】

item.title: 现代汽车利润下滑，原因是汽车销售疲软和地缘政治风险
item.description: 现代汽车公司公布的第三季度利润低于分析师的预期，原因是全球汽车销售不温不火以及地缘政治风险扩大侵蚀了该公司的盈利。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. reported third-quarter profit that fell short of analysts’ estimates as tepid vehicle sales around the globe, and expanded geopolitical risks eroded earnings.】

item.title: 速报采购经理人指数显示印度经济活动恢复势头
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，在制造业和服务业回暖的推动下，印度10月份的经济活动重拾增长势头。【原文：India’s economic activity regained momentum in October, driven by an uptick in manufacturing and services sectors, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市小幅反弹，巴克莱和联合利华发布报告
法国市场收入增长，橙色饮料第三季度销售额上升
item.description: 法国电信运营商 Orange SA 公布第三季度销售额增长，原因是该公司的高端捆绑服务帮助其留住了更多客户，避免了客户流失到竞争对手那里。【原文：Orange SA reported sales growth in the third quarter after the French telecommunications operator’s premium bundles helped it keep more customers from defecting to rivals.】

item.title: 特朗普交易给加密货币带来障碍，比特币涨势降温
item.description: 比特币被归类为所谓的 "特朗普交易"，正开始与全球市场的广泛变化相冲突，部分原因是前总统有可能重返白宫。【原文：Bitcoin’s classification as a so-called Trump trade is starting to jar with wider shifts in global markets attributed in part to the possibility of the former president’s return to the White House.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官希望通过新的合作伙伴关系在印度实现更多增长
item.description: Nvidia 公司的黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）正在与印度最大的企业（从信实工业有限公司到 Infosys 有限公司）建立合作伙伴关系，这凸显了这个世界上人口最多的国家对人工智能先驱未来的重要性。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s Jensen Huang is forging partnerships with India’s biggest corporate names from Reliance Industries Ltd. to Infosys Ltd., underscoring the importance of the world’s most populous country to the AI pioneer’s future.】

item.title: 土耳其银行利率前景受制于高利率
item.description: 紧缩的货币政策和对贷款的限制对土耳其银行的前景造成了压力，促使分析师预测银行利润开始复苏的时间将晚于预期。【原文：Tight monetary policy and limitations on lending are weighing on Turkish banks’ outlook, prompting analysts to predict a later-than-anticipated start of a recovery in their profits.】

item.title: 欧洲央行决策者对未来的看法存在分歧：概述
item.description: 随着欧洲央行 2% 的通胀目标近在咫尺，欧洲央行官员对货币政策走向的看法开始出现分歧。【原文：Views among European Central Bank officials about where to take monetary policy are starting to diverge as the institution’s 2% inflation target moves within close reach.】

item.title: 蓬勃发展的剑桥暴露了英格兰不断扩大的贫富差距
item.description:
这座著名的大学城被各政治派别视为振兴奄奄一息的英国经济的典范。但并非所有人都能分享它的成功。【原文：

The famed university town is seen across the political spectrum as a model for how to revive the moribund UK economy. But not everyone is sharing in its success.

】

item.title: 雷诺确认新车型推动全年业绩展望
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司（Renault SA）确认了全年指导目标，该法国汽车制造商预计将受益于包括 R5 电动汽车和更新的达契亚运动型多功能车在内的新车型。【原文：Renault SA confirmed its full-year guidance as the French automaker expects to benefit from new models including the R5 electric car and updated Dacia sport utility vehicles.】

item.title: 森特诺称，曲线落后的欧洲央行应考虑更大幅度的削减
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）表示，经济复苏乏力和经济前景面临的风险不断增加，是欧洲中央银行考虑大幅降息的一个强烈信号。【原文：The absence of a meaningful recovery and mounting risks to the economic outlook are a strong signal for the European Central Bank to consider steeper interest-rate cuts, Governing Council member Mario Centeno said.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯最大的 ETF 基金将追踪中国股票
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的一家投资公司不久将推出该国最大的交易所交易基金，追踪香港股市，这是中国与这个石油资源丰富的王国之间金融联系更加紧密的最新迹象。【原文：A Saudi Arabian investment firm will soon launch the country’s largest exchange traded fund to track Hong Kong equities, the latest sign of closer financial ties between China and the oil-rich kingdom.】

item.title: 债券市场担心美国共和党大选的 "未知数
item.description:
他们对特朗普肆无忌惮地减税导致赤字增加的前景深恶痛绝，即使股票可能从中受益。【原文：

They deeply dislike the prospect of unchecked Trump tax cuts driving up deficits, even if stocks are likely to benefit.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行霍尔茨曼称 12 月可能降息四分之一个百分点
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，即使通胀上行的风险依然存在，欧洲中央银行今年仍很有可能将利率再下调 25 个基点。【原文：The European Central Bank will most likely lower interest rates by another 25 basis points this year even as upside inflation risks linger, said Governing Council member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: 全球投资者看淡动荡，加大对肯尼亚资产的押注
item.description: 多年来最严重的政治动荡并没有让肯尼亚表现最佳的货币和不断上扬的债券和股票市场黯然失色，因为投资者关注的是不断改善的经济和健康的资本流入。【原文：The worst political upheaval in years hasn’t taken the shine off Kenya’s top-performing currency and rallying bond and stock markets as investors focus on an improving economy and healthy capital inflows.】

item.title: 金沙新加坡赌场扩建成本将翻番至 80 亿美元
item.description: 拉斯维加斯金沙集团（Las Vegas Sands Corp. ）计划扩建其在新加坡的标志性赌场度假村，预计将耗资 80 亿美元，比原先的估算高出一倍多，因为该集团正寻求建立一个新的豪华博彩综合体来推动增长。【原文：Las Vegas Sands Corp.’s planned expansion of its iconic casino resort in Singapore is expected to cost $8 billion, more than doubling its original estimate as the group seeks to build a new luxury gaming complex to drive growth.】

item.title: S&P 将 2024 年全球债券发行量预测上调至 9 万亿美元
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）表示，今年全球债券销售额将攀升17%，达到约9万亿美元，第三季度的势头可能会持续下去，并上调了之前的预期。【原文：Global bond sales will climb 17% this year to about $9 trillion with momentum from the third quarter likely sustained, S&P Global Ratings said, revising up a previous estimate.】

item.title: 中国煤炭市场持续疲软，煤炭买家将减少发货量
item.description: 中国煤炭进口商今年在煤炭贸易中亏损，因此希望减少煤炭运输量。【原文：Chinese coal importers are looking to reduce shipments after they lost money on the trade this year.】

item.title: 预计到 2030 年香港私人财富资产将激增至 23 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，香港管理的私人财富资产可能在六年内翻一番，达到 2.3 万亿美元，这个亚洲金融中心预计将超过瑞士，成为全球最大的跨境财富中心。【原文：Private wealth assets under management in Hong Kong may nearly double to $2.3 trillion in six years, according to Bloomberg Intelligence, with the Asian financial hub projected to surpass Switzerland as the world’s top cross-border wealth center.】

item.title: 500 亿美元资金池帮助印度抵御外资外流
item.description: 在印度股市遭遇自 2020 年初以来最大的外资抛售之际，本地资金的大量流入正在拯救印度股市。【原文：Surging inflows from local funds are coming to the rescue of Indian stocks as they witness the biggest foreign selloff since early 2020.】

item.title: 最近发生碰撞事故的黑暗舰队油轮驶往中国
item.description: 最近在东南亚发生空难的一艘黑船队油轮正在驶往中国的途中。【原文：A dark-fleet oil tanker that was recently involved in a crash in Southeast Asia is now on its way to China.】

item.title: 据说埃利奥特和西南航空公司接近达成和解，以避免董事会之争
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）和美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：Elliott Investment Management and Southwest Airlines Co. are nearing a settlement that would avoid a proxy fight for control of the carrier’s board, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亿万富翁的性传奇是澳大利亚首席执行官们的最新丑闻
item.description: 澳大利亚科技界亿万富翁理查德-怀特（Richard White）涉嫌以性换取投资的丑闻，只是该国最近发生的一起企业灾难，该国正迅速失去作为一个管理严格、治理标准严苛的市场的声誉。【原文：The alleged sex-for-investment scandal embroiling Australian tech billionaire Richard White is just the latest corporate calamity in a country fast losing its reputation as a tightly-regulated market with strict governance standards.】

item.title: Amundi 和贝莱德加入竞争，印度债券 ETF 将吸引数十亿资金
item.description: 世界上一些最大的交易所交易基金提供商正在争夺未来几年有望通过将印度债券纳入主要全球指数而流入印度的数十亿美元资金。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest exchange-traded fund providers are battling it out for the billions of dollars expected to flow into Indian bonds in coming years through their inclusion in key global indexes.】
